product.title: InGlam Hair Dryer Brush Blow Dryer Brush 5 in 1 for Women, Detachable Blowout Brush & Hair Appliances for Straightening/ Drying/ Curling/ Styling/Volumizer, Copper Red
product.title_excluding_brand: Hair Dryer Brush Blow Dryer Brush 5 in 1 for Women, Detachable Blowout Brush & Hair Appliances for Straightening/ Drying/ Curling/ Styling/Volumizer, Copper Red
product.description:
Detachable Design suitable for families, business trips, weddings, and vacations, allowing you to design the hairstyle you want as you want! The exquisite packaging also allows you to use it as a gift for friends, family, or other loved ones.




About this item:

Product Name: IG INGLAM Blowout Brush Dryer Set

Item Weight: 3.5 lb

Item Condition: New

Cord length: 6 FT

Rating Voltage: 125V~ 60Hz

Rating Power: 1100W




Key Features:

1. Negative ion care

2. Polyester bag for easy storage

3. Three temperature settings- High/ Low/ Cool

4. Detachable design for travel

5. Multifunctional - Drying/Straightening/Volume/Curling

6. Nylon bristles and Nylon pins Design reduces static and leaves healthy and shiny hair.

product.description_full:
Detachable Design suitable for families, business trips, weddings, and vacations, allowing you to design the hairstyle you want as you want! The exquisite packaging also allows you to use it as a gift for friends, family, or other loved ones.




About this item:

Product Name: IG INGLAM Blowout Brush Dryer Set

Item Weight: 3.5 lb

Item Condition: New

Cord length: 6 FT

Rating Voltage: 125V~ 60Hz

Rating Power: 1100W




Key Features:

1. Negative ion care

2. Polyester bag for easy storage

3. Three temperature settings- High/ Low/ Cool

4. Detachable design for travel

5. Multifunctional - Drying/Straightening/Volume/Curling

6. Nylon bristles and Nylon pins Design reduces static and leaves healthy and shiny hair. * 5 in 1 Hot Air Styler - The hair dryer brush includes multiple attachments: A smoothing brush, oval brush, blow dryer,Barrel Brush and volumizer diffuser, allowing you to achieve diverse looks, from smooth and straight to bouncy curls, enhancing your styling options.
 * Easy Change Design for Effortless Styling - Just press the button to switch between brush heads, making it a breeze to create everyday sleek styles, romantic curls, or fluffy volume, because every woman deserves effortless beauty.
 * 3 Mode Heat Settings And Negative Ions Technology - The ion technology in this blowout brush seals the hair cuticle, locking in moisture and reducing static for silky, healthy-looking hair.And adjustable heating levels to achieve endless looks and styles. Low temperature or low wind for thin and fine hair. The cool setting for locking in your hair styling. High temp or high wind for thick and coarse hair.
 * Professional Grade Safety Assurance - Engineered for worry-free use, this styling tool is ETL Certified and complies with rigorous U.S. safety regulations, ensuring reliable performance without compromising on protection.
 * Luxury Gift Set – Perfect Present for Hair Lovers! This premium hot air brush comes in an elegant gift box, making it an ideal present for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions. Includes: (1.Styling brush and heat-resistant glove for safe use. 2. Polyester bag for easy storage, travel. 3.Bonus hair clips and hair ties for effortless sectioning.)A thoughtful all-in-one set for anyone who loves hair appliances!

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
